product_name: Kelty Cosmic Down 32 Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: Great for 3-season backpacking, this lightweight bag has water-resistant DriDownTM that provides the compressibility of down with all-weather reliability typically associated with synthetic fill.
short_description: Great for 3-season backpacking, this lightweight bag has water-resistant DriDownTM that provides the compressibility of down with all-weather reliability typically associated with synthetic fill.
